attributes.action: require MP's to give up 1 Months Salary to the UK Economy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In these troubled times of recession and major economic turmoil the person on the street is making sacrifice's and having their tax money given to bail out banks and businesses.

1 Months worth of Salary from the countries MP's/house of commons etc would amount to a large amount of money. Therefore it is proposed that they should all give up 1 month's salary to be put back into the economy.
